did not translate into nutritional impact.
BINP itself was of low effectiveness and did not lead to a sustainable set of actions. In part 
this was due to the project design and inadequate intensity, and in part to complexities in 
implementation (institutional and otherwise). Under the HNPSP there appears to be less 
emphasis on community-based actions and services.
